articles.title: Market taking a breather for fundamentals to catch up: Nilesh Shah - Economic Times
articles.description: I do not think in 2021, we will see 2008 like correction either in the primary market or the secondary market.  In 2021, market was running ahead of fundamentals. It is taking a breather so that fundamentals can catch up now.
